snippet: Puig, a Dodgers outfielder who defected from Cuba in 2012, will join a good-will tour, sponsored by Major League Baseball and the players’ union, next week.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Los Angeles Dodgers outfielder Yasiel Puig, who defected from Cuba in 2012, will join Major League Baseball good-will tour of his home country, despite investigation into his role in Miami nightclub altercation.
lead_paragraph: Puig, a Dodgers outfielder who defected from Cuba in 2012, will join a good-will tour, sponsored by Major League Baseball and the players’ union, next week.

headline.main: Yasiel Puig Will Join Cuba Trip
